name: Get Ride! AM Driver: Soukoku no Shinjitsu
storyline: In the near future, the mysterious invader "Bugchine" will suddenly attack all over the world, and the people of the world (ordinary citizens), who are the only ones who can fight against them, "AM Driver", will fight day and night, rejoiced at their success and were enthusiastic about their mighty power. But when AM Driver's relationship with Bugchines were revealed as a self-made play by the government, the situation changed and led by Jenus, the protagonist of the conflict between the Federal Council, which is the government, and the Justice Army, which is a rebel group, they worked to stop the war and fought to find out where the truth was. In the midst of this, the Justice Army attacked the important base of the government side, and the battle was about to enter a new phase.
summary: Get Ride! AM Driver: Soukoku no Shinjitsu - is a 3D strategic action game that combines the strategic elements of simulation with real-time actionability. It follows the contents of TV anime AM Driver, and the characters of Get Ride! AM Driver: Shutsugeki! Battle Party - also appear.
